meta.title: Aman Singh Kunwar | Full Stack Developer
meta.description: Full stack portfolio built with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS.

hero.name: Aman Singh Kunwar
hero.tagline: I build reliable, scalable web products with clean UX and robust APIs.

basics.availability: Open to internships and junior full stack roles

projects.name: EcoCommute
projects.description: AI-enabled sustainable transport planner that helps users find eco-friendly and time-efficient routes.
highlights: Integrates weather, emissions, and live traffic data to recommend optimized routes
Eco-route optimization with carbon emission tracking
Interactive map experience for route visualization

projects.name: Eventory
projects.description: High-concurrency event ticketing platform built to handle flash-sale traffic without double booking.
highlights: Redis-based distributed locking with Lua scripts for seat guarantees
Event-driven architecture with Kafka and real-time updates via Socket.IO
React frontend with a responsive, mobile-first UI

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and resume.
highlights: Full stack portfolio with editable admin panel and live data sync
Responsive UI with dedicated project detail pages
Reusable data-driven sections for skills, experience, and projects

projects.name: Simon Say Game
projects.description: Interactive Simon Says memory game with enhanced gameplay features.
highlights: Difficulty increases as the game progresses

projects.name: ADHYAN.AI
highlights: Backend service and supporting documentation included

about.summary: Computer Science student focused on building modern full stack applications. I enjoy creating fast, accessible UIs backed by clean APIs and well structured data models.
highlights: Hands on experience with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and system design
Interested in cloud certifications and scalable architecture

experience.title: Social Internship
bullets: Volunteer educator and mentor for Class 11 and 12 students
Collaborated with teachers to build a positive learning environment
Provided one on one guidance for study plans and career goals

experience.title: Looking for Internship
bullets: Available for MERN stack development roles
Interested in product teams focused on real world impact

education.institution: Shree Goverdhan Saraswati Vidya Mandir Inter College Dharampur, Dehradun

achievements.title: HacktheWinter National Level Hackathon
achievements.summary: Rank 47 out of 403 team and shortlisted for final round.
description: Participated in the National Level Hack The Winter 2026 (GEHU Bhimtal + WeCode) with 3 rounds: Online Round 1 (25-30 Dec 2025), Online Round 2 (9-11 Jan 2026), and a 24-hour offline final on 22-23 Jan 2026.
Qualified from 403 teams and secured Rank 47 with team The Code Blooded.
Built ADHYAN.AI for online rounds and Flash Sale Concurrency Guard for the final round, strengthening teamwork and problem-solving skills.

achievements.title: Developathon Surge x DBUU
achievements.summary: Secured 1st position in the National Level Hackathon.
description: Secured First Position in the National Level development-based hackathon "Developathon Surge x DBUU."
Competed against 50+ teams in a 24-hour hackathon and reached the final round.
Built the EcoCommute project focused on sustainable, optimized commuting, and collaborated with Team Code Blodded.

achievements.title: Debug Arena
description: Won the Debug Arena (TechBug Challenge) by Evi Sphere Tech - a no-code UI/UX bug-spotting event.
Online challenge held on 12 Oct 2025 (7-8 PM) with free entry and certificates.
Spotted 48 bugs across 4 pages in Round 1 and 20+ design issues on a meme site in Round 2, earning a 3-month Spotify Premium prize.

achievements.title: Aasraa Trust Social Internship
achievements.summary: Social internship experience at Aasraa Trust.
description: Completed a 1-month social internship (1-31 July 2025) at Aasraa Trust, Dehradun.
Taught Chemistry to Class 11 & 12 students under the BANNU Aasraa Project, guided learners in Hindi and English, and resolved doubts using relatable examples.
Built communication, teaching, and time-management skills while contributing to education for underprivileged students.

contact.address: Police Family Quarters, Raipur Road, Dehradun
